front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage (1000Vac and below, 3200Vdc and below) Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
